meanings.definition: Quick or sharp in movement or action.

meanings.sent2: She always chooses the snappiest route to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: The snappiest squirrel in the park outsmarted all the others in a nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: His snappiest reflexes saved him from tripping over the rock.
meanings.sent5: The snappiest dancer at the party impressed everyone with their agility.
